content: **crocheted leaf in drops merino extra fine ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-244 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements approx 6 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 07 light brown or use the following colours 18 green 26 pistachio 30 mustard 31 forest green 37 misty forest 41 olive 47 sage green 49 chocolate 1 leaf weighs approx 5 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm
